channel.title: Docker on $ linux docs
channel.description: Recent content in Docker on $ linux docs

item.title: Install Docker on Ubuntu
item.description: Installation Steps 1. Update package index sudo apt update 2. Install dependencies sudo apt install apt-transport-https ca-certificates curl software-properties-common 3. Install Docker sudo apt update sudo apt install docker-ce docker-ce-cli containerd.io 4. Verify installation sudo docker run hello-world
